      • search

        public static java.util.List<ReturnedDocument> search(java.lang.String location,
                                                      int numOfMatches,
                                                      java.lang.String queryInput,
                                                      java.lang.String searchSelector,
                                                      TextOrHtmlFilesSelectorEnum fileSelector)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException,
                                                      org.apache.lucene.search.highlight.InvalidTokenOffsetsException
        Searching the documents.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the folder you are searching in (currently not used)
        numOfMatches - the number of matches you want to get
        queryInput - the query input from the user
        searchSelector - the search selector (by title, body or both)
        fileSelector - selects if html or text files are searched
        Returns:
        the list with matched documents
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - the parse exception
        org.apache.lucene.search.highlight.InvalidTokenOffsetsException - the invalid token offsets exception

      • startSearching

        public static java.util.List<ReturnedDocument> startSearching(java.lang.String location,
                                                              int numOfMatches,
                                                              java.lang.String queryInput,
                                                              java.lang.String searchSelector,
                                                              TextOrHtmlFilesSelectorEnum fileSelector)
        Start searching. Trying to call the search method
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the folder you are searching in
        numOfMatches - the number of matches you want to get
        queryInput - the query input from the user
        searchSelector - the search selector (by title, body or both)
        fileSelector - selects if html or text files are searched
        Returns:
        the list with matched documents
